readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.7/f Maru 1000/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Maru 9 15 3 Harvey 7 10 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/showFrame Maru 18/viewport 10 15/pause 4000/speak Maru "*嘆息*…我對於準備這些樣本很不在行…$s"/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/pause 100/playSound throw/showFrame Maru 17/shake Maru 2000/jump Maru/specificTemporarySprite maruBeaker/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1250/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 100/speak Maru "啊！糟糕！$4"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/speak Maru "整份樣本都被毀了……哈維會把我殺了……$s"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "$q 38 null#@我應該怎麼辦？#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#從地板上鏟起來就好。他不會發現的。#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#告訴哈維是我的錯。#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#告訴哈維，這純屬意外。"/move Harvey 3 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 2/doAction 10 13/move Harvey 0 1 2/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Harvey "發生了什麼事？我聽到東西打碎的聲音。"/pause 500/speak Maru "$p 38#我不小心摔碎了一份樣本……真是對不起。$s|@進來後猛地一關門，嚇得我打碎了一份樣本。$u"/fork toldTruth/move Harvey 0 2 3/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "瑪魯，你不能把自己的問題推卸到別人身上。$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "*唉*……我只好讓病人再來採集一次樣本了。$s#$b#這很可能會害得我們又虧損一個月……$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 16/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end
content.toldTruth: move Harvey 0 2 3/speak Harvey "瑪魯，謝謝你告訴我事實真相。#$b#不用擔心樣本的事情，我們會再採集一份。"/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 500/speak Maru "謝謝你對我的包容，哈維醫生。"/pause 500/speak Harvey "當然……你在這裡幫了我不少忙。沒有你，我都不知道該怎麼辦！"/pause 500/emote Maru 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 500/emote Harvey 8/speak Harvey "@？你的臉色有些蒼白……你還好嗎？"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/end
content.57/f Harvey 1000/p Harvey: sweet/-100 -100/farmer 10 19 0 Harvey 9 14 3/skippable/doAction 10 13/viewport 10 14/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "@！我正要給你寫信呢。"/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/speak Harvey "我的紀錄顯示，你該進行一年一度的體檢了！"/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "現在就開始吧……用不著擔心。一下下就好，一點也不痛。請跟我來。"/pause 600/advancedMove Harvey false 1 0 0 -4 -5 0/move farmer 0 -7 0 false/move farmer -4 0 3 true/viewport move -1 -2 4500/proceedPosition Harvey 5 10/doAction 5 9/move Harvey 0 -5 2 false/move farmer -1 0 0 false/move farmer 0 -4 0 false/pause 500/speak Harvey "嗯……好。請待著別動。"/pause 2000/speak Harvey "說「啊啊啊……」"/pause 500/speak Harvey "好，可以啦。"/pause 600/move Harvey -1 0 0/pause 1000/showFrame Harvey 19/playSound openBox/pause 1000/showFrame Harvey 8/move Harvey 0 1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Harvey "我只要檢查一下你的重要器官。"/pause 800/animate Harvey false true 100 4 5 6 7/positionOffset Harvey 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/stopAnimation Harvey/showFrame Harvey 20/pause 150/showFrame Harvey 21/pause 1500/speak Harvey "$q 86 null#嗯……你的心跳有點快。$u#$r 86 20 event_heart1#我有點緊張。#$r 86 20 event_heart2#我剛才在農場裡做事，現在還沒喘過來氣。#$r 86 -50 event_heart3#你真的是醫生嗎？我的心跳很正常！"/pause 800/showFrame Harvey 20/pause 150/showFrame Harvey 4/animate Harvey false true 100 7 6 5 4/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/stopAnimation Harvey/pause 1300/speak Harvey "好啦！看來你身體很好， @。#$b#只要當心做事別太累著就好！"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/move farmer 0 1 2 true/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2/speak Harvey "感謝你來就診。$h"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/end
content.571102/f Harvey 2000: Hospital_Ambient/-100 -100/farmer -200 -2000 0 Harvey 4 5 0/skippable/changeLocation HarveyRoom/showFrame Harvey 23/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "喂？喂？有誰在嗎？$9"/pause 1300/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "我是H醫生……這裡是北緯52度東經43.5度……正在進行無線電呼叫……有人聽到嗎？$9"/pause 2000/emote Harvey 40/pause 700/playSound newArtifact/message "收到……地面的H醫生……這裡是黑鳥55Z。有事匯報嗎？"/showFrame Harvey 28/jump Harvey/pause 800/speak Harvey "真有人聽到了嗎！？$10#$b#地面情報匯報：風速3KPH，風向西偏北36度。地面溫度42度。濕度53%。H醫生通話結束！$10"/pause 300/playMusic kindadumbautumn/faceDirection Harvey 1 true/move Harvey 2 0 1/speak Harvey "啊，我的脈搏在上升……$7"/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 12/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "@!"/question fork1 "#詢問哈維他為何那麼緊張。#假裝一切正常。"/fork normal/pause 500/speak Harvey "啊，我正在進行無線電通訊……而我居然遇到了真正的飛行員！"/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "現在應該就能看到他從我們頭頂飛過！"/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "快點，快過來！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -3 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -2 0/speed farmer 4/speak Harvey "快看！"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "小時候，我的夢想就是當飛行員。"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "但因為我視力不好，而且極度懼高，這個夢想已經漸漸暗淡了。$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1600/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "沒事的……不用替我遺憾。#$b#我長大了，能接受自己人生的定位了。不是所有人都能實現夢想的……人生就是這樣的。"/pause 1600/speak Harvey "嘿，你來看看我的飛機模型。我剛剛完成新的TR-星鳥豪華版。$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 16 0/faceDirection farmer 2/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end
content.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message "……{0}？"/pause 1000/message "好了，放輕鬆……慢慢來。"/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "有人發現你不省人事地倒在地上……所以我給你做了緊急手術！#$b#下次小心點，好嗎？$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end
